main event: On August 17, 1955, an airman observed a bright bluish-white light moving across the sky at high speed, estimated at 500-700 mph.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 2 minutes before disappearing from sight,The estimated altitude of the object was around 20,000 feet,The sighting was reported at 0300 hours,There was a subsequent pilot report suggesting the sighting could be an illumination flare,The initial report was part of Project Blue Book investigations.
